Sentencas: Sm2O3-doped CeO2 (Sm0.15Ce0.85O1.925, SDC) thin films were formed by e-beam evaporation method.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of samarium doped ceria films formed by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: Thin films were formed evaporating micro powders (particle size varied from 0.3 to 0.5 mu m).
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of samarium doped ceria films formed by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: The influence of deposition rate on formed thin film structures and surface morphology were characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscope (SEM), energy dispersion spectrometry (EDS), and atomic force microscopy (AFM).
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of samarium doped ceria films formed by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: The deposition rate of formed SDC thin films was changed from 2 to 16 angstrom/s.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of samarium doped ceria films formed by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: The electrical properties were investigated as a function of frequency (0.1-10(6) Hz) at different temperatures (473-873 K).
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of samarium doped ceria films formed by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: The formed SDC thin ceramic films repeat the crystallographic orientation of the initial powders using different substrates and different deposition rate.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of samarium doped ceria films formed by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: It was determined that crystallites size and samarium concentration are decreasing by increasing the deposition rate.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of samarium doped ceria films formed by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: The crystallites size decreased from 17.0 nm to 10.4 nm when SDC thin films were deposited on Alloy 600 (Fe-Ni-Cr), and decreased from 13.7 nm to 8.9 nm when were used optical quartz substrate.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of samarium doped ceria films formed by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: The best ionic conductivity sigma(tot) = 1.66 Sm-1 at 873 K temperature, activation energy Delta E-a = 0.87 eV (sigma(g) = 1.66 Sm-1, sigma(gb) = 1.66 Sm-1) was achieved when 2 angstrom/s deposition rate was used.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of samarium doped ceria films formed by e-beam deposition technique

Sentencas: The grain size (in the formed SDC thin films) was similar to 83 nm in this case.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of samarium doped ceria films formed by e-beam deposition technique
